recipe.name: Asparagus Soup

ingredient.ingredient_name: light cream or half and half

recipe.preparation: Cut top 1 1/2" off the tops of half the asperagus and reserve.  Slice remaining asparagus.Melt 2 Tbl of butter in a large saucepan.  Gently fry the sliced shallots until soft but not brown, 2-3 minutes.  Add the asparagus and fry for about 1 minute before adding flour.  Wait an addtional minute before adding stock or water, lemon juice and seasoning to taste.  Bring to a boil before reducing to simmer partially covered for 15-20 minutes or until asparagus is exceptionally tender.Puree soup.   In another pan, melt the remaining butter fry the reserved asparagus tips for 3-4 minutes.  Bring soup back up to temperature and add cream and asparagus, heating slowly. Garnish with chervil.
recipe.source_name: Ingram, Christine, Roz Denny, and Ketherine Richmond. Vegetarian and Vegetable Cooking. Anness Publishing Ltd: Hermes House, 2002. 142
